main.name: Elijah Soladoye
main.occupation: Fullstack Django | ReactJS Developer && UE4 Game Development Enthusiast
main.description: Always learning how to build positively impacting, optimized and immersive stuff. #Mikaelson
main.bio: I have over four years of experience as a Full Stack Django | ReactJS Developer. I've worked on e-commerce websites, real-time chatting apps, and blog apps, as well as allauth authentication, payment gateways such as Paystack and Stripe, and business campaign technologies such as Sendgrid, Mailgun, and Mailchimp, all of which were deployed to services such as Heroku, AWS, and Firebase. I enjoy problem solving and developing optimized and secure programs that have a beneficial impact on people's lives.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build amazing and impacting stuff, I mean, who doesn't love a good challenge right?, so don't hold back.

testimonials.text: In some ways, programming is like painting. You start with a blank canvas and certain basic raw materials. You use a combination of science, art, and craft to determine what to do with them.
Study without desire spoils the memory, and it retains nothing that it takes in.
The most damaging phrase in the language is.. it's always been done this way
